p: At the time of writing, there are no authorized cannabis or cannabis-derived veterinary medicinal products on the market in the EU, US, or Canada. On the EU market, one product is authorised in Germany (Cardio ReVet RV4) and registered as a homeopathic veterinary medicine [ 93]. In addition, one CBD product (Anibidiol) registered as a feed supplement is marketed in several EU Member States such as France and the Netherlands [ 94]. Anibidiol contains CBD and Vitamins B3 and B6. The leaflet mentions “ Veterinarians have good experience in using this product for behavioural problems, pain, infection, epilepsy and the consequences of tumours in dogs and cats”. The product is available without the need for a veterinary prescription.
